Text: TWP and NNG Stats Cc As per your request please see the attached document Thanks Gary Allen Safety System Reporting Advisor Original Message From Lowry Phil Sent Monday October AM To Edwards Ralph Cc Hayslett Rod Subject FW Ralph please get with Rod and provide what ever he needs in the way of Safety Stats Original Message From ROD HAYSLETT mailto Sent Saturday October PM To Lowry Phil Subject FW Where can I get info on safety statistics for the pipes Original Message From mailto Sent Saturday October PM To Subject finalizing due diligence do you have the ingaaaga report you referenced in our meetings

RE TWP and NNG StatsFrequency or incident rates are calculated as follows Lost Time no of incidents x total no man hours worked Recordable same as above There are individual recordable cases and ALL lost time incidents are counted as one lost time and one recordable In other words every LT adds one to LT and one to Recordables Vehicle Frequency no of accidents x total miles driven More explanation at safetystatisticsdefaultasp Thanks Gary Allen Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Friday November AM To Allen Gary Cc Edwards Ralph Fields Kerry Subject RE TWP and NNG Stats Can you give me a quick definition of the frequency rates formula please Original Message From Allen Gary Sent Thursday November PM To Hayslett Rod Cc Edwards Ralph Fields Kerry Subject TWP and NNG Stats As per your request please see the attached document Thanks Gary Allen Safety System Reporting Advisor Original Message From Lowry Phil Sent Monday October AM To Edwards Ralph Cc Hayslett Rod Subject FW Ralph please get with Rod and provide what ever he needs in the way of Safety Stats Original Message From ROD HAYSLETT mailto Sent Saturday October PM To Lowry Phil Subject FW Where can I get info on safety statistics for the pipes Original Message From mailto Sent Saturday October PM To Subject finalizing due diligence do you have the ingaaaga report you referenced in our meetings
